item.description:
Alias for `function` keyword

See https://github.com/qt4cg/qtspecs/issues/548#issuecomment-1591023928 and the subsequent comments:

[â€¦] I would still be in favor to have fn or f as a plain alias for function (and optionally drop the thin arrow syntax), simply because function items and declarations can get so frequent:

fn($a) { $a + 1 }
